# ExESS API -- Spherical Coordinates 
Vectors defining a position or a velocity in a **spherical** coordinate system and in **spherical** 
elements, like the one shown in Eq. \eqref{eq:spherical_coordinate} are implemented as 
[`GlobalSphericalPosition`](/api/base/cs.qmd) and [`GlobalSphericalVelocity`](/api/base/cs.qmd).  
:::
